144   @GET
145   @Path("providers")
146   @RestQuery(
147     name = "getproviders",
148     description = "Returns a list of available statistics providers",
149     returnDescription = "The list of available statistics providers as JSON",
150     restParameters = {
151       @RestParameter(
152         name = "filter", isRequired = false,
153         description = "Usage [Filter Name]:[Value to Filter With]. Available filter: \"resourceType\"",
154         type = RestParameter.Type.STRING),
155       @RestParameter(
156         name = "withparameters", isRequired = false,
157         description = "Whether the parameters should be included in the response.",
158         type = RestParameter.Type.BOOLEAN)
159     },
160     responses = {
161       @RestResponse(
162         description = "Returns the requested statistics providers as JSON",
163         responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK),
164       @RestResponse(
165         description = "If the current user is not authorized to perform this action",
166         responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_UNAUTHORIZED)
167     })
168   public Response getProviders(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader, @QueryParam("filter") String filter,
169         @QueryParam("withparameters") Boolean withParameters) {
170 
171     ResourceType resourceType = null;
172 
173     if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(filter)) {
174       for (String f : filter.split(",")) {
175         String[] filterTuple = f.split(":");
176         if (filterTuple.length != 2) {
177           logger.debug("No value for filter {} in filters list: {}", filterTuple[0], filter);
178           continue;
179         }
180         String name = filterTuple[0];
181         String value = f.substring(name.length() + 1);
182 
183         if ("resourceType".equals(name)) {
184           try {
185             resourceType = ResourceTypeUtils.fromString(value);
186           } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
187             return RestUtil.R.badRequest("Invalid value for 'resourceType'");
188           }
189         } else {
190           logger.warn("Unknown filter criteria {}", name);
191           return RestUtil.R.badRequest("Unknown filter");
192         }
193       }
194     }
195 
196     Set<StatisticsProvider> providers;
197     if (resourceType != null) {
198       providers = statisticsService.getProviders(resourceType);
199     } else {
200       providers = statisticsService.getProviders();
201     }
202 
203     JSONArray result = new JSONArray();
204     providers.stream().map(p -> StatisticsProviderUtils.toJson(p, withParameters)).forEach(result::add);
205 
206     return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(acceptHeader, result.toJSONString());
207   }
208 
209   @GET
210   @Path("providers/{providerId}")
211   @RestQuery(
212     name = "getprovider",
213     description = "Returns the statistics provider with the specified id",
214     returnDescription = "The requested statistics provider",
215     pathParameters = {
216       @RestParameter(
217         name = "providerId", description = "The identifier of the statistics provider",
218         isRequired = true, type = RestParameter.Type.STRING)
219     },
220     restParameters = {
221       @RestParameter(
222         name = "withparameters", isRequired = false,
223         description = "Whether the parameters should be included in the response.",
224         type = RestParameter.Type.BOOLEAN)
225     },
226     responses = {
227       @RestResponse(
228         description = "Returns the requested statistics provider as JSON",
229         responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK)
230     })
231   public Response getProvider(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader, @PathParam("providerId") String id,
232         @QueryParam("withparameters") Boolean withParameters) {
233 
234     if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(id)) {
235       Optional<StatisticsProvider> provider = statisticsService.getProvider(id);
236       if (provider.isPresent()) {
237         return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(acceptHeader, StatisticsProviderUtils.toJson(provider.get(),
238             withParameters).toJSONString());
239       } else {
240         return ApiResponseBuilder.notFound("Cannot find a statistics provider with id '%s'.", id);
241       }
242     } else {
243       return RestUtil.R.badRequest("Invalid value for providerId");
244     }
245   }
246 
247   @POST
248   @Path("data/query")
249   @RestQuery(
250     name = "getstatistics",
251     description = "Returns the statistical data based on the query posted",
252     returnDescription = "The statistical data as JSON array",
253     restParameters = {
254       @RestParameter(
255         name = "data", description = "An JSON array describing the queries to be executed",
256         isRequired = true, type = RestParameter.Type.TEXT)
257     },
258     responses = {
259       @RestResponse(
260         description = "Returns the statistical data as requested by the query as JSON array",
261         responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK),
262       @RestResponse(
263         description = "If the current user is not authorized to perform this action",
264         responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_UNAUTHORIZED)
265     })
266   public Response getStatistics(@HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader, @FormParam("data") String data) {
267 
268     List<QueryUtils.Query> queries = null;
269     try {
270       queries = QueryUtils.parse(data, statisticsService);
271     } catch (Exception e) {
272       logger.debug("Unable to parse form parameter 'data' {}, exception", data, e);
273       return RestUtil.R.badRequest("Unable to parse form parameter 'data': " + e.getMessage());
274     }
275 
276     JSONArray result = new JSONArray();
277     queries.stream()
278       .peek(query -> checkAccess(query.getParameters().getResourceId(), query.getProvider().getResourceType()))
279       .map(query -> QueryUtils.execute(query))
280       .forEach(result::add);
281 
282     return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(acceptHeader, result.toJSONString());
283   }
284 
285   @POST
286   @Produces({ ApiMediaType.JSON, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_4_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_5_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_6_0,
287               ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_7_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_8_0, ApiMediaType.VERSION_1_9_0 })
288   @Path("data/export.csv")
289   @RestQuery(
290           name = "getexportcsv",
291           description = "Returns a statistics csv export",
292           returnDescription = "The requested statistics csv export",
293           restParameters = {
294                   @RestParameter(
295                           name = "data", description = "A JSON object describing the query to be executed",
296                           isRequired = true, type = RestParameter.Type.TEXT),
297                   @RestParameter(
298                           name = "limit", description = "Limit for pagination.",
299                           isRequired = false, type = RestParameter.Type.INTEGER),
300                   @RestParameter(
301                           name = "offset", description = "Offset for pagination.",
302                           isRequired = false, type = RestParameter.Type.INTEGER),
303                   @RestParameter(
304                           name = "filter", description = "Usage [Filter Name]:[Value to Filter With]. Multiple filters can be used by combining them with commas \",\".",
305                           isRequired = false, type = RestParameter.Type.STRING)
306           },
307           responses = {
308                   @RestResponse(
309                           description = "Returns the csv data as requested by the query as plain text",
310                           responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_OK),
311                   @RestResponse(
312                           description = "If the current user is not authorized to perform this action",
313                           responseCode = HttpServletResponse.SC_UNAUTHORIZED)
314           })
315   public Response getExportCSV(
316           @HeaderParam("Accept") String acceptHeader,
317           @FormParam("data") String data,
318           @FormParam("limit") Integer limit,
319           @FormParam("offset") Integer offset,
320           @FormParam("filter") String filter
321   ) throws NotFoundException, SearchIndexException, UnauthorizedException {
322 
323     final int lim = limit != null ? Math.max(0, limit) : 0;
324     final int off = offset != null ? Math.max(0, offset) : 0;
325 
326     final Map<String, String> filters = Arrays.stream(Optional.ofNullable(filter).orElse("")
327             .split(","))
328             .filter(f -> f.contains(":"))
329             .collect(Collectors.toMap(
330                     f -> f.substring(0, f.indexOf(":")),
331                     f -> f.substring(f.indexOf(":") + 1)));
332 
333     QueryUtils.Query query = null;
334     try {
335       query = QueryUtils.parseQuery(data, statisticsService);
336     } catch (Exception e) {
337       logger.debug("Unable to parse form parameter 'data' {}, exception", data, e);
338       return RestUtil.R.badRequest("Unable to parse form parameter 'data': " + e.getMessage());
339     }
340     checkAccess(query.getParameters().getResourceId(), query.getProvider().getResourceType());
341 
342     final QueryUtils.ExportParameters parameters = (QueryUtils.ExportParameters) query.getParameters();
343     final String result = statisticsExportService.getCSV(
344             query.getProvider(),
345             parameters.getResourceId(),
346             parameters.getFrom(),
347             parameters.getTo(),
348             parameters.getDataResolution(),
349             this.elasticsearchIndex,
350             ZoneId.systemDefault(),
351             true,
352             parameters.getDetailLevel(),
353             lim,
354             off,
355             filters
356     );
357 
358     return ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(acceptHeader, new JSONObject(Collections.singletonMap("csv", result)).toJSONString());
359   }
360 
361   private void checkAccess(final String resourceId, final ResourceType resourceType) {
362     try {
363       switch (resourceType) {
364         case EPISODE:
365           checkMediapackageAccess(resourceId);
366           break;
367         case SERIES:
368           checkSeriesAccess(resourceId);
369           break;
370         case ORGANIZATION:
371           checkOrganizationAccess(resourceId);
372           break;
373         default:
374           break;
375       }
376     } catch (UnauthorizedException | SearchIndexException e) {
377       chuck(e);
378     }
379   }
380 
381   private void checkMediapackageAccess(final String mpId) throws UnauthorizedException, SearchIndexException {
382     final Opt<Event> event = indexService.getEvent(mpId, elasticsearchIndex);
383     if (event.isNone()) {
384       // IndexService checks permissions and returns None if user is unauthorized
385       throw new UnauthorizedException(securityService.getUser(), "read");
386     }
387   }
388 
389   private void checkSeriesAccess(final String seriesId) throws UnauthorizedException, SearchIndexException {
390     final Optional<Series> series = elasticsearchIndex.getSeries(seriesId, securityService.getOrganization().getId(), securityService.getUser());
391     if (series.isEmpty()) {
392       // IndexService checks permissions and returns None if user is unauthorized
393       throw new UnauthorizedException(securityService.getUser(), "read");
394     }
395   }
396 
397   private void checkOrganizationAccess(final String orgId) throws UnauthorizedException {
398     final User currentUser = securityService.getUser();
399     final Organization currentOrg = securityService.getOrganization();
400     final String currentOrgAdminRole = currentOrg.getAdminRole();
401     final String currentOrgId = currentOrg.getId();
402 
403     boolean authorized = currentUser.hasRole(GLOBAL_ADMIN_ROLE)
404             || (currentUser.hasRole(currentOrgAdminRole) && currentOrgId.equals(orgId));
405 
406     if (!authorized) {
407       throw new UnauthorizedException(currentUser, "read");
408     }
409   }
